faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.contraindications_answer: Pregnancy, breastfeeding, active skin conditions, recent Botox (2 weeks), blood thinners, and autoimmune conditions. Full consultation covers all requirements.
faq.prep_answer: Avoid alcohol, caffeine, and blood thinners 24h before. No brow tweezing 1 week prior. Come makeup-free to the appointment area.
faq.healing_answer: Initial healing 7-10 days, full color development 4-6 weeks. Touch-up appointment recommended at 6-8 weeks for optimal results.
faq.aftercare_answer: Day‑by‑day aftercare with touch‑up reminders included. Complete healing guide provided after treatment.

policy.title: Studio Policies
policy.subtitle: Please review contraindications, prep checklist, and healing timeline before booking.
policy.cancellation_text: 24h notice required for changes. Same-day cancellations forfeit deposit. Reschedule up to 48h before appointment.
policy.touchup_text: Complimentary touch-up included within 8 weeks. Additional sessions at reduced rate if needed.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before your appointment

contraindications.question: What are the contraindications for permanent makeup?
contraindications.answer:
Please avoid permanent makeup if you are:
• Pregnant or breastfeeding
• Taking blood thinners
• Have active skin conditions in the treatment area
• Have autoimmune disorders
• Recently had Botox (wait 2 weeks)

Please consult with us if you have any concerns.

preparation.question: How should I prepare for my appointment?
preparation.answer:
24-48 hours before:
• Avoid alcohol and caffeine
• Don't take aspirin or blood thinners
• Avoid sun exposure to the treatment area
• Don't wax or tint brows for 1 week
• Come with clean, makeup-free skin
• Eat a good meal before coming

healing.question: What should I expect during healing?
healing.answer:
Healing timeline:
• Days 1-3: Darker than expected, slight swelling
• Days 4-7: Scabbing and flaking (don't pick!)
• Days 8-14: Color appears lighter
• Weeks 3-4: True color emerges
• Week 6-8: Fully healed

Complete healing takes 6-8 weeks.

touchup.question: When do I need a touch-up?
touchup.answer:
First touch-up is included and recommended:
• 6-8 weeks after initial procedure
• Allows us to perfect color and shape
• Essential for best long-term results

Annual touch-ups recommended to maintain color intensity.

aftercare.question: What aftercare is required?
aftercare.answer:
For best results:
• Keep area dry for 24-48 hours
• Apply healing balm as directed
• Avoid makeup on treated area for 1 week
• No swimming, saunas, or intense workouts for 1 week
• Avoid direct sun exposure
• Don't pick or scratch healing skin

Detailed aftercare sheet provided.

booking.question: How do I book and what's your cancellation policy?
booking.answer:
Booking:
• Book directly through Booksy for instant confirmation
• 50% deposit required to secure appointment
• Full payment due day of service

Cancellation policy:
• 48 hours notice required for changes
• Less than 24 hours = forfeit deposit
• No-shows forfeit full payment
